CHG0034401: FL, MA, MW, NA, NC, NE, PN, RM, SO, SP, SW, UK

If limited or no user downloads, deploy previous version of IRMA Client via VSTS (anyone who downloaded new client, must remove 'apps\2.0\' folder).  If many users downloaded client update, the version should be incremented in Git, then client rebuilt and deployed.

Change ticket number: Usually a link to a component-deploy script, such as "IRMA Release Launcher" powershell
